# userInterfaceLayoutDirection

**Type Property**

A layout direction hint.

## Declaration

```swift
static let userInterfaceLayoutDirection: NSImageRep.HintKey
```

## Discussion

The value for this key is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] with an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSUserInterfaceLayoutDirection] value.

## Hint Keys

- **ctm**: A context transform hint.
- **interpolation**: An interpolation hint.
